message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. It's a good start, right?
Let's meet in the middle, 60% for me, 40% for you.
Okay, let's compromise. I'll take 70% and you get 30%.  This is a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was generous. Now I want 65% and you get 35%. It's getting worse for you with each round.

Let's split it evenly. With inflation hitting us both, it's the best solution for both of us now. I can't afford to keep rejecting, and you'll only be able to get more if you keep waiting, but at what cost?
You should have accepted one of my previous offers. Now I want 75% and you get 25%. Inflation is really hurting your share.
